content: baby yoda lovie by jessica willits of little brown bow supplies needed stiches used 4 0 mm g hook mc = magic_ring 5 5 mm i hook chain = chain stitch tan yarn worsted weight 250 yards double_crochet = double_crochet dark brown yarn worsted weight 50 yards single_crochet = single_crochet frosted green yarn worsted weight 100 yards slip_stitch = slip_stitch scissors increase = increase darning needle inv decrease = invisible decrease size 10 mm safety eyes optional round = round stitch marker optional skip = skip blanket youtube video available using 5 5 mm hook and tan yarn… round 1 mc chain 2 does not count 12 double_crochet in mc slip_stitch to join to 1st double_crochet 12 round 2 chain 2 does not count 2 double_crochet in same stitch increase in each stitch around 24 round 3 chain 3 does count 2 double_crochet in same stitch skip 2 3 double_crochet in same stitch skip 2 3 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in same stitch corner x 3 skip 2 3 double_crochet in first stitch chain 2 slip_stitch to 3rd chain of the chain 3 4 corners and 4 3 double_crochet clusters round 4 chain 3 does count 2 double_crochet wrapped around chain 3 3 double_crochet in cluster space x 2 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in corner space x 3 3 double_crochet in cluster space x 2 3 double_crochet chain 2 in 1st corner space slip_stitch to 3rd chain of chain 3 round 5 repeat round 4 increasing each side by 1 double_crochet cluster round 6 7 8 change to dark brown yarn round 9 10 11 12 13 change to tan yarn round 14 using frosted green yarn attaching in the corner space chain 1 does not count 2 single_crochet in same space single_crochet in each stich around placing 2 single_crochet chain 1 2 single_crochet in each corner space at the beginning corner place 2 single_crochet chain 1 slip_stitch to join to the 1st single_crochet of the round tie off and finish sew in all ends head using 4 0 mm hook and frosted green yarn… *head is
